MarkedMod:FirstStrike.NAME: First Strike
MarkedMod:FirstStrike.DESCRIPTION: If the target has no Mark, Apply !M! Mark.

MarkedMod:GentlePulse.NAME: Gentle Pulse
MarkedMod:GentlePulse.DESCRIPTION: All enemies loose HP equal to their Mark. NL Remove !M! Mark from all enemies.

MarkedMod:OneThousandNeedles.NAME: One Thousand Needles
MarkedMod:OneThousandNeedles.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Mark. NL All enemies loose HP equal to their Mark. NL Whenever you change Stances, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

MarkedMod:PinPointDefense.NAME: Pin Point Defense
MarkedMod:PinPointDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block whenever you apply Mark. NL Apply 3 Mark whenever an enemy attacks you.

MarkedMod:DanceOfDeath.NAME: Dance of Death
MarkedMod:DanceOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL When drawn, enter Dance of Death. You can not enter any other Stance while this is in your hand.
MarkedMod:DanceOfDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL When drawn, enter Dance of Death. You can not enter any other Stance while this is in your hand. NL Exhaust this at the end of your next turn.

MarkedMod:NorthStar.NAME: North Star
MarkedMod:NorthStar.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Mark and all enemies loose HP equal to their Mark X times. End your turn. NL Exhaust.
MarkedMod:NorthStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Mark and all enemies loose HP equal to their Mark X+1 times. End your turn. NL Exhaust.

MarkedMod:BlockChi.NAME: Block Chi
MarkedMod:BlockChi.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Mark. If at least !M! Mark was removed, the target is stunned.
